midiOutHelp: MIDI out is the MIDI bus for sending info to BitWig Studio
midiMelodyChannelHelp: This is the MIDI bus for sending Guitar info to Bitwig Studio
midiImprovChannelHelp: This is the MIDI bus for sending Magenta return to Bitwig Studio
midiBassChannelHelp: This is the MIDI bus for sending the Bass note to Bitwig Studio
midiLeadChannelHelp: This is the MIDI bus for sending the Lead note(s) to Bitwig Studio
